featured.text: Many nations have worked together to stop polluting space.
If people keep polluting the rivers, no fish there will survive ______.

definition.zh_def: 污染，指對環境或自然資源造成有害影響的行為或過程。
definition.en_def: To make (air, water, or soil) dirty or harmful to health or the environment.
definition.example: Factories often pollute the air with harmful emissions.
